PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1996-04941996-04-160,  ,  ,  FIN, 
PrecisAmendments to the INCOME TAX REGULATIONS which allow specified Canadian development overhead expenses that are renounced by a corporation to its shareholders under a flow-through share agreement to be reclassified as Canadian exploration expenses.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 1996-0199 Publication Date: 1996-05-01
Attachments
precis:
Amendments to the INCOME TAX REGULATIONS which allow specified Canadian
development overhead expenses that are renounced by a corporation to its
shareholders under a flow-through share agreement to be reclassified as
Canadian exploration expenses.
